A

age - Variable in class edu.guilford.Creature
An integer that is the number of days the object has been alive; it is alway initialized to zero
alive - Variable in class edu.guilford.Creature
A boolean with true meaning alive and false meaning dead; is initialized to true when the object is instantiated

C

changeSize(float) - Method in class edu.guilford.Creature
Changes the value of size by a specified amount; if size is less than or equal to zero, then the object invokes die() and alive is set to False
chew(Plant) - Method in class edu.guilford.PlantEater
The PlantEater object eats (chews) part of a specified Plant object.
chewedOn(float) - Method in class edu.guilford.Plant
The size of this object is decreased by a specified amount after being chewed on; the amount cannot exceed the current size of the object
Creature - Class in edu.guilford
A class that represents a creature in the simulation
Creature(float, float) - Constructor for class edu.guilford.Creature
A constructor that initializes the size and rate of the object to the specified values and sets alive to true and age to zero
CreatureDriver - Class in edu.guilford
A driver program for the Creature class and its subclasses
CreatureDriver() - Constructor for class edu.guilford.CreatureDriver
 
Critter - Class in edu.guilford
A class that represents a critter object in the simulation
Critter(float, float, float) - Constructor for class edu.guilford.Critter
A constructor that initializes a default of the Critter object with a size, growth rate, and amount of food needed; foodEaten will be set to zero

D

die() - Method in class edu.guilford.Creature
Makes an object "dead" by setting size and rate to 0 and setting alive to False.

E

eat(float) - Method in class edu.guilford.Critter
A method that adds an amount (in g) to the value of foodEaten
edu.guilford - package edu.guilford
 

F

foodEaten - Variable in class edu.guilford.Critter
A positive floating-point number that is the amount of food eaten so far in the day It is set to zero when the object is initialized and at the beginning of each new day

G

getAge() - Method in class edu.guilford.Creature
A getter for age
getFoodEaten() - Method in class edu.guilford.PlantEater
A method that returns the amount of food eaten by the PlantEater object
getFoodNeed() - Method in class edu.guilford.Critter
A getter for foodNeed
getRate() - Method in class edu.guilford.Creature
A getter for rate
getSize() - Method in class edu.guilford.Creature
A getter for size

I

isAlive() - Method in class edu.guilford.Creature
A getter for the value of alive

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class edu.guilford.CreatureDriver
 
MeatEater - Class in edu.guilford
A class that represents a meat eater object in the simulation
MeatEater(float, float, float) - Constructor for class edu.guilford.MeatEater
A constructor that initializes a meat eater object with a size, growth rate, and amount of food needed; foodEaten will be set to zero

P

Plant - Class in edu.guilford
A class that represents a plant in the simulation
Plant(float, float) - Constructor for class edu.guilford.Plant
A constructor that initializes a default of the Plant object with a size and growth rate
PlantEater - Class in edu.guilford
A class that represents a plant eater (herbivore) in the simulation
PlantEater(float, float, float, Plant[]) - Constructor for class edu.guilford.PlantEater
A constructor that initializes a default PlantEater object with a size, growth rate, amount of food needed, and a list of Plant objects it can eat

R

rate - Variable in class edu.guilford.Creature
A floating-point number that is the current rate of growth of the object (in grams/day)

S

setFoodNeed(float) - Method in class edu.guilford.Critter
A setter for foodNeed
setRate(float) - Method in class edu.guilford.Creature
A setter for rate
simulateDay() - Method in class edu.guilford.Creature
Simulates one day of growth for the object by changing the size and increasing the age by one
simulateDay() - Method in class edu.guilford.Critter
A method that simulates a day in the life of the Critter; The Critter dies if the amount of foodNeed is less than the amount of foodEaten; If the Critter is still alive, then the amount of foodEaten should be set to zero for the next simulated day
simulateDay() - Method in class edu.guilford.MeatEater
A method that simulates a day in the life of the meat eater; along with adding onto the simulateDay method in the Critter class, the meat eater object can chase and eat one or two plant eater objects a day, causing the plant eater to die.
simulateDay() - Method in class edu.guilford.PlantEater
A method that simulates a day in the life of the PlantEater; it first chews on a randomly determined number of plants; after chewing on all the plants, it calls the simulateDay method of the Critter class and then the simulateDay method of the Creature class and makes changes to the object's size and age accordingly
size - Variable in class edu.guilford.Creature
A positive floating-point number that is the current size of the object (in grams)
stillAlive(ArrayList<? extends Creature>) - Static method in class edu.guilford.CreatureDriver
Evaluates a list of creatures to determine if any are still alive
stillNeed() - Method in class edu.guilford.Critter
Returns the amount of food still needed (foodNeed - foodEaten)

T

toString() - Method in class edu.guilford.Plant
A method that returns a string representation of the object
toString() - Method in class edu.guilford.PlantEater
A method that returns a string representation of the object
totalMass(ArrayList<? extends Creature>) - Static method in class edu.guilford.CreatureDriver
Evaluates a list of creatures to determine the total mass of all the creatures in grams
